localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: The CEO known for increasing his employees’ base annual pay to $70,000 says wealthy people donating and getting rewarded with “glowing articles, a hospital named after you and a massive tax write-off” amount to “one of capitalism’s biggest PR scams.” https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text: 这位因将员工基本年薪提高到7万美元而闻名的CEO表示，富人捐款并获得 "光鲜亮丽的文章、以你名字命名的医院和大量的税收减免 "的奖励，相当于 "资本主义最大的公关骗局之一 "https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc。
這位因將員工基本年薪提高到7萬美元而聞名的CEO表示，富人捐款並獲得 "光鮮亮麗的文章、以你名字命名的醫院和大量的稅收減免 "的獎勵，相當於 "資本主義最大的公關騙局之一 "https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc。

previous.excerpt: We can not share links when we are speaking in podcasts or clubhouse rooms. Hupu, creates numbers for your links and people who wants to reach, enter number to hupu app or webpage and reach links without sign-in.
previous.title: Hupu - Share a link with your audience via numbers

localize.description: 我们在播客或会所房间发言时，不能分享链接。Hupu，为你的链接和想联系的人创建号码，输入号码到hupu应用或网页，无需登录就能联系到链接。
localize.tagline: 通过数字与您的受众分享链接

localize.description: 我們在播客或會所房間發言時，不能分享鏈接。Hupu，爲你的鏈接和想聯繫的人創建號碼，輸入號碼到hupu應用或網頁，無需登錄就能聯繫到鏈接。
localize.tagline: 通過數字與您的受衆分享鏈接

next.excerpt: doodad.dev is a site for tools to make the internet faster, more accessible, and more expressive. The pattern generator helps you make seamless, unique, royalty-free patterns. You can export as SVG, JPEG, or PNG. It's free forever, no tracking, etc. Enjoy!
next.title: Doodad Pattern Generator - Create unique, seamless, royalty-free patterns

localize.description: doodad.dev是一个让互联网更快、更方便、更有表现力的工具网站。图案生成器可以帮助你制作无缝、独特、免版税的图案。你可以导出为SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永远免费，没有跟踪等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 创建独特、无缝、免版税的图案

localize.description: doodad.dev是一個讓互聯網更快、更方便、更有表現力的工具網站。圖案生成器可以幫助你製作無縫、獨特、免版稅的圖案。你可以導出爲SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永遠免費，沒有跟蹤等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 創建獨特、無縫、免版稅的圖案
